attributes.action: Allow everyone in the UK no matter what district to one free go at IVF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think we all pay tax and national insurance so whether we live in Hampshire, chichester, scotland, yorkshire or anywhere we should be entitled to one free go at IVF, if drug users/alcoholics/unwanted pregnancies (which are all self inflicited and the majority don't work) can all get help, we should also get help !!
